Description: Role Description:The purpose of this role is to provide front desk reception duties and administrative support to the team. You will be responsible for the overall front office activities, including meeting and greeting customers in a professional and warm manner, organizing office communication and activities on a day-to-day basis. Responsibilities within the company will be added to this position with continues experience and growth.Duties & Responsibilities:• Be reliable, well organized and have demonstrated ability to juggle multiple priorities in a very busy office environment.• Provide full admin support to the team and department• Perform data-entry, documentation, printing and filling duties• Maintain a proper and user-friendly filling and document control system for recording and tracking of all documentSkills
Skills: • Have excellent interpersonal skills and pleasant phone manners.
